role.argrole: other item in exchange, old thing (usually marked by: ب )

example.parse: (S (VP (DET+NOUN.VN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC المطالبين) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN السيادة)))))) (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يريدون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (S-NOM-OBJ (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_ACC ابدال) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN النفوذ) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN السوري)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN النفوذ) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الاميركي)))))))))
